price: Nokorε sε, Nyankopͻn ne Ɔkyε adeε Hene; Otumfoͻ Ɔhoͻdenfoͻ paa ne no.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ ٱلرَّزَّاقُ ذُو ٱلۡقُوَّةِ ٱلۡمَتِينُ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: inna al-laha huwa al-razāqu dhū al-quwati al-matīnu
